casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James Earl EWELL. No. 108P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Glenn Gerding, for Ewell. Q. Shante Martin, Assistant Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: 168 N.C.App. 98 , 606 S.E.2d 914 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th day of December 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of March 2008."
